name: Aurora (itch) (</abclive>)
description:
This is an experimental game of space discovery. It's mainly me testing Superpowers Engine in 3D conditions with RNG.

If you have any question you can send them to me on twitter -> @abcliveFR

Controls:

  • WASD to move in Space
  • Mouse position to control orientation/direction of the ship (Center to stabilize)
  • Space and X to go up and down
